研究人员获得了270万美元的NIH赠款，以发展下一代合成血液失血是1至46岁的创伤患者死亡的主要原因，这主要是因为他们无法迅速获得安全的血液来源。可能的解决方案？冷冻干燥的合成血。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250331/researchers-receive-2427.27亿nih-nih-nih-grant-to-to-to-develop-te-the-next-next-next-next-next-next-next-genter-synthethetic-blood.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250331/researchers-receive-2427.27亿nih-nih-nih-grant-to-to-to-develop-the-next-next-next-next-next-next-next-next-of-synthethetic-blood.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=938d594f-d9d2-d9d2-4f29-8f21-47a494b82959 Mon, 31 Mar 2025 23:07:36 -0400 Researchers receive $2.7 million NIH grant to develop the next generation of synthetic blood
长期的先验冥想证明可以改善压力和衰老标记Maharishi国际大学（MIU），Siegen大学和统一的健康科学服务大学的研究人员进行的一项合作研究表明，实践先验冥想（TM）技术的个人长期表现出良好的生物学标记。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250331/long-term-term-transcendental-meditation-shown-shown-shown-to-improve-sress-stress-and-aging-markers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250331/long-term-term-transcendental-meditation-meditation-shown-shown-to-improve-sress-and-aging-markers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f654efab-4462-462-4C22-B0D6-4C2E8AC325E0 Mon, 31 Mar 2025 23:00:11 -0400 Long-term Transcendental Meditation shown to improve stress and aging markers
研究有助于表征睡眠不足可能与阿尔茨海默氏症的发病机理有关新的研究表明，随着时间的流逝，特定睡眠阶段的比例较低与容易发生阿尔茨海默氏病的地区的大脑体积减少有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250331/study-helps-characterize-how-sleep-sleep-depeational-relate-to-relate-to-alzheimers-pathogenesis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250331/study-helps-characterize-how-sleep-deep-decipity-may-relate-to-to-to-alzheimers-parthopenesis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=be9992E8-0428-47D6-BC70-8A2BF632FC17 Mon, 31 Mar 2025 22:50:57 -0400 Study helps characterize how sleep deficiency may relate to Alzheimer's pathogenesis

研究表明，大多数基于植物的牛奶不满足幼儿的营养需求用大多数植物性饮料代替牛奶，除非产品加油，否则在幼儿的饮食中削减了幼儿饮食中的关键营养素。特别配制的大豆饮料可以维持甚至可以增强铁和碘的摄入量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250331/study-reveals-most-plant--plant-m------------------------------done28099t-meet-toddlerse28099-nutrient-needs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250331/study-reveals-most-plant-m-------------------------------------milks-done28099t-meet-meet-toddlerse28099-nutrient-needs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fbe6da62-b251-487a-a881-55d6259a6775 Mon, 31 Mar 2025 22:41:00 -0400 Study reveals most plant-based milks don’t meet toddlers’ nutrient needs

研究表明研究人员发现，尽管从2010年到2023年，美国马拉松和半程马拉松期间的心脏骤停率仍然保持稳定，但这些事件死亡的可能性下降了近一半，但感谢更快的紧急响应和广泛使用除颤器。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250331/defibrillters-and-cppr-cut-cut-cut-marathon-cardiac-deaths-in-half-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250331/defbibillillators-and-cppr-cut-cut-cut-marathon-cardiac-deaths-in-half study-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1BCBEC74-AA0B-4EF5-9726-D0A7EDE8B3D3 Mon, 31 Mar 2025 21:05:00 -0400 Defibrillators and CPR cut marathon cardiac deaths in half, study shows
全球研究发现，五种生活方式改变50可以为您的生活增加十年研究估计了修改心血管危险因素（如高血压，吸烟和肥胖）的全球终生风险和益处，显示了预期寿命和生活质量的显着改善。它强调了早期干预和中年改变在预防心血管疾病和死亡率方面的重要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250331/five-lifestyle-changes-by-50-can-add-a-decade-to-your-life-life-life-life-life-life-life-life-life-life-life-life-life-global-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250331/five-lifestyle-changes-by-50-can-add-a-decade-to-your-life-life-life-life-life-life-life-life-life-life-life-life-global-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=043450E4-C42D-4D7B-8AAD-6923EDCB81B8 Mon, 31 Mar 2025 20:43:00 -0400 Five lifestyle changes by 50 can add a decade to your life, global study finds
